greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of iterations of A234741 needed when started from n before a fixed point is reached.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to polynomials in ring GF(2)[X]
formula: If A234741(n) == n, then a(n) = 0, otherwise a(n) = 1 + a(A234741(n)).
program: A234741(n) = {n=factor(n); n[, 1]=apply(t->Pol(binary(t)), n[, 1]); sum(i=1, #n=Vec(factorback(n))%2, n[i]<<(#n-i))}; \\ From A324741
xref: Cf. A234741, A235034 (positions of zeros), A260712, A325561.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 10 2019
